examples.title: With keyboard navigation
examples.description: Attach standard keyboard shortcuts to important pagination controls.

examples.title: With label
examples.description: Add a label between navigation buttons to provide more context of the content being viewed by the user.

examples.title: With table type
examples.description: Use for pagination at the bottom of tables or lists.

examples.title: Default
With keyboard navigation
With label
With table type

pageProps.seoDescription: Use pagination to let merchants move through an ordered collection of items that has been split into pages. On the web, pagination uses buttons to move back and forth between pages. On iOS and Android, pagination uses infinite scrolling.

PaginationProps.name: PaginationProps

members.name: nextKeys
members.description: Keyboard shortcuts for the next button

members.name: previousKeys
members.description: Keyboard shortcuts for the previous button

members.name: nextURL
members.description: The URL of the next page

members.name: previousURL
members.description: The URL of the previous page

members.name: hasNext
members.description: Whether there is a next page to show

members.name: hasPrevious
members.description: Whether there is a previous page to show

members.name: accessibilityLabels
members.description: Accessible labels for the buttons and UnstyledLinks

members.name: onNext
members.description: Callback when next button is clicked

members.name: onPrevious
members.description: Callback when previous button is clicked

members.name: label
members.description: Text to provide more context in between the arrow buttons
